name: Belgian Fries - GMTK Game Jam submission
name_original: Belgian Fries - GMTK Game Jam submission
description:
A little game developped during the 2020 GMTK game jam.
The year is 2030. There is a global salt shortage on earth, and the last place with salt known to man is an interstellar gas station. You're part of a Belgian crew carrying humanity's last BELGIAN fries, which must not go cold before you find the salt. Right when you got the coordinates right, a French ship attacked you. The damage sustained caused the navigation system to go haywire. The ship AI will take you down dangerous paths  to get to the gas station and you won't be able to avoid anything. The last bit of control you have is the defence system, whose systems have to be activated and used manually. Don't forget the French are still coming at you for these fries!
